original_title: Them Crooked Vultures (2010) Live at BBC Radio 1, London, UK on March 24, 2010
overview: Set List : 1. New Fang 2. Dead End Friends 3. Mind Eraser, No Chaser 4. Spinning in Daffodils  Band : Dave Grohl – drums, backing vocals Josh Homme – lead vocals, guitars, slide guitar John Paul Jones – bass, keyboards Alain Johannes – guitars, slide guitar, backing vocals
title: Them Crooked Vultures (2010) Live at BBC Radio 1, London, UK on March 24, 2010
